name: Phone

values.name: format
values.comment:
Formats a phone number by country (in form of iso2)

For example:

    import Phone

    output = Phone.format "us" "2345678912"

    --> output == "+1 (234) 567-8912"

    -----------------------------------------------

    import Phone

    output = Phone.format "gb" "2345678912"

    --> output == "+44 2345 678912"

values.name: getAllCountries
values.type: List ( String, String, String, Maybe.Maybe String )

values.name: getCountryByISO2
values.type: String -> Maybe.Maybe ( String, String, String, Maybe.Maybe String )
